components.name: hero
components.heading: Innovation through research and development
components.description: We currently work on research and development projects not only to serve our customers but also to develop our own product lines. Our goal is to develop our skills and technologies and enhance our presence in the global market.

components.name: grid
components.heading: Analyze, measure, and improve your customer experience. Over and over again.
components.description: We make it simple to launch modern techniques and tools for your team or organisation, whether in the cloud or your premises.

tiles.heading: Data Analytics & Information Visualization
tiles.description: Privacy-preserving Platform (PPP) for GDPR compliance ensuring that your data is remembered and respected.

tiles.heading: Social Media & Collaborative Systems
tiles.description: Semantic Artificial Intelligence Platform (SAIP) for “fake news” identification coming from social media, websites, fora, etc. targeting vulnerable groups of people.

tiles.heading: Smart Technologies
tiles.description: IoT Device Behaviour Analyzer (DBA) for automatic detection of suspicious (unauthorized) devices connected to your IoT network.

tiles.heading: Safety & (Cyber)Security
tiles.description: Data Lineage Platform (DLP) for improving your organization’s transparency with regulators regarding personal data flows.
